items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection! Definitely a lightweight DUPE for my Barefoot Dreams cardigan!!
items.body: This cardigan is SO comfortable, doesn’t make me itch as I have very sensitive skin, looks fabulous, you can dress it up or dress it down, and it’s Very lightweight!! I WILL be buying other colors in this brand bc I love the longer length of this cardigan. I’m 5’11” and it hit me about mid thigh! It’s so soft and cozy you’ll want to snuggle up in it! It Definitely reminds me of my Barefoot Dreams cardigan just without the warmth bc this is a light weight cardigan PLUS it’s a fraction of the price! The way it lays and looks I’d definitely call this a Barefoot Dreams DUPE!! It’s perfect for Spring, Chilly days and nights during the Summer and will be perfect for early Fall!! If you work in an office this would be perfect anytime of the year! I can’t wait to add more colors to my wardrobe!!!! Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will want one in different colors.
items.body: Love these sweaters, I have maybe 8 or more in different colors. True fit, lightweight but warm. Comfortable and I love the length. I wear them with dress pants and jeans. Read more
items.author: Vicki Scott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cardigan I’ve bought in a long time!
items.body: So soft and the fit was perfect! Ordered more in other colors. Read more
items.author: Lolo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3rd purchase
items.body: I do not see my other review(s) but just received my 3rd sweater and am happy to have a set of these to choose from for office-wear. Purchased the dark grey, coffee and recently the black one. These are between lightweight and medium weight and great for layering. They are well made, no loose threads or unravelling problems at all with any of mine, and they wash (I do in cool water) and dry in dryer quickly and excellently.. I remove and place on hanger immediately. The collar is ok, I think it is upside down on one of mine but not really noticeable. My only gripe is that they all seem a bit small around and don't come together in the front overlapping and cozy like the model shows. Granted she's a skinny girl and probably in something oversized for her body, but I am 5'3" and 150lbs - two of mine are large and my newest I bought XL.. I don't notice a big difference between the sizes. I cannot imagine the 5'2" 190lb reviewer in my XL. I DO notice the conflicting description stating "womens" in one place and "juniors" on my orders.. perhaps that is the problem with my fit? Still, they are nice and I do recommend.. just order up a size or two if you want cozy. The black and grey are nice, the coffee is a weird shade of brown with kind of an orange reddish hue? Hard to describe.. wish I had ordered just brown, but this is how ordering online goes some times. Hope these are ordered in more muted shades going forward...not big on bold or primary colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect length and fit!!
items.body: Nice quality, color, size, length and fit. Feels like a a very nice, high-end sweater. PRO: The color was the perfect Kelly Green. PRO: The quality and weight of the fabric was very nice, and washes up well. I have washed it twice and the color has remained nice and vibrant and did not run or lighten. I do however, recommend using a lingerie bag and washing on gentle just to be safe. PRO: The sweater weight is perfect for chilly days and in cold office environments. It not too bulky. PRO: The fit is perfect in the shoulders and body and not too baggy. The length fell just below my bum and works well over leggings. CON: The only one that I can think of is that I can't afford to buy all the colors that I would like to. LOL! Read more
items.author: CLL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I own 4 now!
items.body: Omg I am in love. I bought four so far and will buy more when they are on sale again. Soft, thin but warm, silkish material. Looks great over a blouse for work or over a Tshirt with jeans for a casual outfit. I got the XXL (5 foot 8 and 250ish lbs) and have a long torso and it covers my butt. Coffee color is not a true brown nor is it maroon but like a nice mix to it. Read more
items.author: JR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect & I am picky
items.body: I am very happy with this everyday cardigan! It is well made & flattering. The fabric is comfortable, perfect for a sunny 60–70-degree day or anytime indoors that you want to be comfy & stylish. The pockets help with my social awkwardness (I don't have to worry about what to do with my hands lol) & are just fun to have. Order this one : ) Read more
items.author: Jeffrey Ray

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Changed the sweater blend for the worse
items.body: Their replacement of acrylic in the blend this year for polyester makes a thinner, scratchier, fabric. The colors are nice but I don’t like the updated fabric, which feels/looks cheap and is not very warm. Last year’s sweaters had enough weight to layer in an AZ winter but comfortable enough for spring and fall. This year’s sweaters feel more like a summer layer only. This year’s sweaters are 75% viscose and 25% polyester (left, royal blue). Last year’s sweaters were 65% viscose and 35% acrylic (right, grey). The loss of the acrylic in the blend means less softness on the skin, no pretty subtle ‘halo’ in the light, lighter weight, less warmth, and a less sophisticated look. The addition of polyester means more scratchiness, increased thinness/transparency, and a cheaper look for too much money. The only good thing about polyester is that it takes color very well, but so do plastic hoola hoops. I’m disappointed, Grace Karin. The last thing I’d want in a sweater is frickin’ polyester. Read more
items.author: AzRen

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Army Olive, A Tan, Black, Light Yellow, Coffee, Navy Blue, Apple Green, Orange, Deep Grey, Light Blue, Red, Fawn, Beige, Ivory. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
